data.comment: The match is underway. Blackburn have kicked-off.
Goal! Tyrhys Dolan gives Blackburn a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 12, It's now 0-2 in Derby as Bradley Johnson scores for Blackburn.
Goal! Bradley Johnson extends Blackburn's lead to 0-3.
Lee Buchanan (Derby County) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 36, Bradley Johnson (Blackburn) has received a yellow card from David Webb.
Blackburn's Darragh Lenihan has been booked in Derby.
David Webb blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half is underway in Derby - Derby County with the kick-off.
Derby County make their first substitution with George Evans replacing Jack Marriott.
Tony Mowbray (Blackburn) is making a first substitution, with Ryan Nyambe replacing Joe Rankin Costello.
In the minute 66, Joe Rothwell for Blackburn has been booked by David Webb and receives a first yellow card.
Harry Chapman is replacing Tyrhys Dolan for the away team.
Duane Holmes is on a sub for Max Bird for Derby County.
In the minute 76, The home team replace Louie Sibley with Morgan Whittaker.
Goal! Blackburn extend their lead to 0-4 through Adam Armstrong.
At Pride Park Stadium, Wayne Rooney has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 79, Elliott Bennett is replacing Joe Rothwell for Blackburn at Pride Park Stadium.
David Webb blows to end the match. The final score is 0-4.
